about_the_game:
Experience the ultimate VR adventure, combining climbing, shooting, melee combat, and platforming with advanced locomotion. This game features a complete dialogue and quest system, immersing you in an epic journey where you start as one of a million sperm, transforming into a baby through various stages and challenges.

  • Epic Journey Through Unique Stages: Embark on a one-of-a-kind adventure, starting with navigating the Vagi-Way, overcoming platforming challenges, and then riding iconic vehicles like the Trojan Transport, Condom Car, and Kayak.

  • Quirky Characters: Meet the hilarious trio—Corn, Popcorn, and Horn—who provide guidance, entertainment, and quirky dialogue throughout your journey.

  • Challenging Encounters: Battle against the white cell guards, using skill and strategy to defeat them and move forward in your journey.

  • Epic Climbing Challenges: Test your skills as you scale the Ute-Rise, a towering mountain with snow-capped peaks and difficult obstacles to overcome.

  • Mysteries to Uncover: Explore the secrets hidden within the Fallopian Church and dive deep into a world full of strange discoveries and unexpected twists.

This VR adventure offers a unique blend of humor, action, and immersive mechanics. With its diverse challenges and engaging storyline, it’s a journey like no other!

name: Once Upon A Baby VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X or equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 32 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 13 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest

reviews:
“Best indie VR game 2024”
10/10 – The Naked Game Dev

“Craziest One Person Project”
Good – GameDevWanli
short_description: Embark on a unique adventure as one of a million sperm, transforming into a baby. Navigate Vagi-Way, ride the Trojan Transport, and battle white cell guards at the Cervigate. Climb snowy Ute-Rise and uncover secrets in the Fallopian Church. And meet quirky characters like Corn, Popcorn, and Horn.
